resources.string: The Smart Guard 24x7 Suite is to control the central ‘Hub’. Be sure to use an active SIM card with balance and SMS pack to communicate with the Hub!
Adding a new device to expand your home security is as easy as 3 taps!”
Have Certain Sensors stay vigilant for intruders while you’re at home!”
Hubs are central base stations of the Smart Guard Suite. To register a hub, please do the following:
● Insert an active SIM card that can send / receive SMS (with sufficient balance or SMS Pack) into the Hub
● Power on the Hub and wait till first beep sound heard from Hub
● Add the Hub Serial No. and Phone No. of SIM card in Hub below and press the ‘Add hub’ button”
